DOC.brief_summary: In patient osteoporosis , bisphosphonates ( BPs ) golden standard treatment . However , bone turnover marker bone mineral density ( BMD ) improve osteoporotic patient even though take BPs alfacalcidol several year . In case , investigator better prescribe BPs Eldecalcitol , instead BPs Alfacalcitol .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Eldecalcitol Bisphosphonate Non-respondered-patients With Osteoporosis
DOC.detailed_description: Alfacalcitol Eldecalcitol similar vitamin D drug . However , Eldecalcitol improve vitamin D drug Alfacalcitol . Therefore , investigate effectiveness Eldecalcitol study .
